name: New Wash Method for All Hair Types
subtitle: PRE-WASH AND NEW WASH ORIGINAL
details: The fastest way to healthier hair—pure and simple.Get a quick deep-clean withPre-Wash, the first scalp-purifying rinse that uses prebiotic micellar technology to break down buildup and balance the microbiome.Follow withNew Wash Originalto cleanse, condition and nourish hair while balancing the scalp’s natural oils.Use the versatileMassaging Scalp Brushto boost both products’ effectiveness. The silicone bristles are soft enough to soothe your scalp yet stiff enough to remove impurities and thoroughly work in (then rinse out) New Wash.In addition to ensuring the most effective results from your New Wash routine, Pre-Wash helps your hair and scalp transition from traditional shampoo to our detergent-free cleansing cream.
benefits: PRE-WASH Purifies the scalp and balances its microbiome, letting you go longer between washesNEW WASH ORIGINAL Gently removes dirt, oil and buildup

name: New Wash Original
subtitle: CLEANSING CREAM FOR ALL HAIR TYPES
how_to_use: STEP 1: APPLYWet hair and dispense a generous amount of New Wash, about the combined amount of shampoo and conditioner you typically use. Layer it on from scalp to ends.STEP 2: SPLASHAdd a splash of water to get a smooth, milky consistency.STEP 3: MASSAGEWork New Wash into hair and scalp, using our Massaging Scalp Brush to coat every inch—scrub, massage, repeat.STEP 4: RINSELet it sit for 2-3 minutes, then rinse thoroughly, using the scalp brush to ensure all product is washed out.

name: Pre-Wash
subtitle: PREBIOTIC MICELLAR SCALP RINSE
details: Get a head start on your New Wash routine with a quick and refreshing deep clean. Pre-Wash uses purifying prebiotic micellar technology to gently break down product buildup, oil and dirt while balancing your scalp’s microbiome. Natural, upcycled betaine helps maintain optimal scalp moisture so you can go even longer between washes—even if you have super-oily hair.New to New Wash? Pre-Wash helps you make a clean break from damaging traditional shampoo to our detergent-free cleansing cream. If you’ve already made the switch, Pre-Wash ensures the most effective results for your hair and scalp.Theparagraph symbolrepresents new beginnings throughout a story, just as Pre-Wash marks a fresh start for your scalp and the first step of your cleansing routine.Vegan (U.S. only)Leaping Bunny CertifiedSilicone-FreeDetergent-FreeParaben-FreeMicrobiome-FriendlyRecyclableAlcohol-FreeFragrance-FreeColor-Safe
benefits: PURIFY Refreshes hair and removes unwanted product buildup, oil and dirtBALANCE Start with Pre-Wash to break down buildup, oil and dirt on the scalp with detergent-free micellar technology  (a first!). Prebiotics balance the scalp microbiome as you deep clean.TRANSITION Helps hair and scalp transition from traditional shampoo to detergent-free New Wash
how_to_use: 1. Divide dry hair into sections.2. Use the applicator tip to apply Pre-Wash evenly to roots and scalp, one section at a time.3. Massage into scalp with our signature Massaging Scalp Brush or your fingers and leave on for 3-4 minutes.4. Wash hair with New Wash.Use Pre-Wash with every wash or as needed to help remove excess oil, dirt and buildup from hair treatments or styling products. You can also use Pre-Wash between wash days for a refreshing cleansing experience—it won’t leave any greasy residue.
ingredients: Water, Propanediol, Betaine, Glycolipids, Inulin, Polyglyceryl-4 Pelargonate, Levulinic Acid, Tetrasodium Glutamate Diacetate, Caprylhydroxamic Acid, Glycerin, Sodium Levulinate, Maltodextrin, Citric Acid, Arginine, Nephelium Lappaceum (Rambutan) Seed Extract
enhanced_description: Best for: all, oily, product_buildup hair. Prebiotic micellar scalp rinse that purifies the scalp and removes product buildup. Use before New Wash for deeper cleansing. Ideal for oily hair, product buildup, or transitioning from traditional shampoo.

name: Primer
subtitle: SMOOTHING AND MOISTURIZING PROTECTION MIST
details: More moisture; more protection. Primer is a weightless leave-in mist that brings together the smoothing and detangling benefits of cutting-edge actives with substantial protection from heat (up to 450°F), humidity, pollution and UV rays. Think of it as an invisible shield that locks in moisture and helps your other products work harder.Use Primer as a prep step—after cleansing with New Wash or between wash days—for strands that are silky, safeguarded and set for whatever style comes next.Thesemicolonrepresents a smooth transition between two connected thoughts; in your haircare routine, Primer marks where cleansing ends and styling begins.Vegan (U.S. only)Leaping Bunny CertifiedSilicone-FreeDetergent-FreeParaben-FreeMicrobiome-FriendlyRecyclableAlcohol-FreeFragrance-FreeColor-Safe
benefits: MOISTURIZE Infuses lightweight moisture to smooth, detangle and nourish strandsPREP Primes hair for more manageable styling with cutting-edge activesPROTECT Prep hair with Primer, a lightweight mist that shields hair from UV rays and heat up to 450°F as it sets you up for smoother styling.ENHANCE Refreshes curls and boosts the efficacy of the next steps in your haircare routine
how_to_use: 1. Mist Primer over dry or damp hair.2. Use your fingers to distribute evenly.3. Style as usual.
ingredients: Water, Propanediol, Betaine, Glycerin, Inulin, Olea Europaea (Olive) Leaf Extract, Levulinic Acid, Tetrasodium Glutamate Diacetate, Syringa Vulgaris (Lilac) Leaf Cell Extract, Caprylhydroxamic Acid, Sodium Levulinate, Pentylene Glycol, Citric Acid, Cyclodextrin, Arginine, Cyamopsis Tetragonoloba (Guar) Gum, Xanthan Gum, Tocopherol, Phytic Acid
enhanced_description: Weightless leave-in mist with heat protection up to 450°F. Provides moisture, detangles, and protects from heat, humidity, and UV damage. Essential for anyone using heat tools.

name: Bond Boost for New Wash
subtitle: ENHANCED DAMAGE REPAIR TREATMENT
details: Who hasn’t put their strands through some sh*t? Repair damaged hair from the inside out with Bond Boost for New Wash, powered by our exclusiveProTarget Technology™.Mix Bond Boost with New Wash to deliver intense and prolonged recovery benefits—all while you cleanse and condition.Double repairProTarget Technology™is uniquely formulated with liposomes that zero in on compromised areas of the hair.Within the fiber, a clinically proven complex with itaconic acid and arginine restores disulfide bonds that have been damaged by chemical treatments like dyes, bleach and relaxers.On the outer cuticle, nourishing ingredients including panthenol and ceramide NP replenish moisture to heal frizz and prevent split ends and breakage. Hair is stronger, smoother, softer and shinier—for longer.Each Bond Boost tube must be mixed with 8oz New Wash (sold separately); do not use this product alone. Follow with Bond Serum for maximum absorption of its reparative ingredients.Silicone-FreeLeaping Bunny CertifiedSulfate-FreeAlcohol-FreeParaben-FreeDetergent-FreePhthalate-Free
benefits: REPLENISH Nourishes and moisturizes the cuticle with ceramides to repair external damageRESTORE Reconnects chemical bonds within the hair fiber with amino acids and panthenol to repair internal damageSTRENGTHEN Decreases breakage, minimizes hair loss and helps prevent damage from chemical treatmentsPRIME Helps Bond Serum penetrate deeper into damaged hair fibers for enhanced repair benefits
how_to_use:
1. Shake the tube well. 
2. Squeeze the entire contents of tube and 8oz New Wash into the jar, then whisk together thoroughly. 
3. Get hair wet, coat hair with the mix and deeply massage it into roots and all the way down to tips. 
4. Let it sit for 3-5 minutes. 
5. Rinse very well.
ingredients: Water, Coco-Caprylate/Caprate, Propanediol, Betaine, Glycerin, Isoamyl Laurate, Xanthan Gum, Triolein, Castor Oil Propanediol Esters, Sodium Stearoyl Laylate, Brassica Campestris Aleurites Fordi Oil Copolymer, Sodium Anisate, Levulinic Acid, Tapioca Starch, Tetrasodium Glutamate Diacetate, Sodium Levulinate, Phosphatidylcholine, Itaconic Acid, Arginine, Mannitol, Panthenol, Algin, Polyglyceryl-10 Laurate, Linum Usitatissimum (Linseed) Seed Extract, Salvia Hispanica Seed Extract, Cetyl Alcohol, Potassium Sorbate, Sodium Benzoate, Benzyl Alcohol, Ceramide NP, Citric Acid, Xylitol, Caprylic Acid, Cetrimonium Chloride, Sodium Chloride
enhanced_description: Best for: damaged, chemically_treated, bleached hair. Intensive damage repair treatment that must be mixed with New Wash. Uses ProTarget Technology to repair disulfide bonds damaged by chemical treatments. For severely damaged hair from bleaching, coloring, or heat styling.

name: Bond Serum
subtitle: DAMAGE REPAIR LEAVE-IN TREATMENT
details: Who hasn’t put their strands through some sh*t? Repair damaged hair from the inside out with Bond Serum, powered by our exclusiveProTarget Technology™. name: Care and Texture Set
subtitle: NEW WASH ORIGINAL, HAIR BALM AND UNDRESSED
details: Simplify your routine with this best-selling lineup of cleansing and styling products for all hair types.Cleanse withNew Wash Original, our detergent-free formula that enhances your natural texture, preserves color and avoids damage caused by traditional shampoos.For one-step styling, addHair Balmto damp hair then let air-dry for enhanced natural texture.Spritz onUndressedto create texture and soft waves without adding weight.
benefits: NEW WASH ORIGINAL Gently removes dirt, oil and buildupUNDRESSED Creates texture for a wavy finish that’s soft and lushHAIR BALM Define curls and enhance natural texture with one-step styling
enhanced_description: STYLING BUNDLE - TEXTURE & DEFINITION: Complete styling routine for creating texture and definition. Includes Hair Balm for moisture and definition, and Undressed for beach waves. Perfect for anyone wanting to enhance their hair's natural texture. Bundle saves money compared to buying products separately.

name: Massaging Scalp Brush
subtitle: SOOTHING SCALP BRUSH FOR NEW WASH
details: The Massaging Scalp Brush plays a crucial role as New Wash’s sidekick, cranking up our hero product’s effectiveness and versatility. The silicone bristles are soft enough to soothe your scalp yet stiff enough to remove impurities and thoroughly work in (then rinse out) New Wash every time.
benefits: WORK IN (AND OUT)Evenly distributes and thoroughly rinses out New WashENHANCE Helps to activate the naturally derived cleansing ingredients in New WashSTIMULATE Promotes blood circulation for more vigorous hair growth and less hair loss
how_to_use: The Massaging Scalp Brush serves double-duty on wash day:1. Use it to massage New Wash into your scalp and evenly distribute the product throughout your hair.2. Wait 2-3 minutes, then use it to thoroughly rinse your scalp and hair.
enhanced_description: Silicone scalp brush for effective product application and scalp massage. Soft bristles soothe scalp while removing impurities. Essential tool for proper New Wash application and scalp health.

name: Travel Bottle
subtitle: 3OZ NEW WASH TRAVEL BOTTLE
details: Our squeezable 3oz travel bottle is refillable and made from recyclable plastic.New Wash sold separately.Recyclable
how_to_use: Dispense your favorite New Wash formula and take your healthy hair routine on-the-go.
enhanced_description: TSA-compliant travel bottle for taking Hairstory products on the go. Leak-proof design perfect for travel. Essential for anyone who travels frequently and wants to maintain their haircare routine.

name: Damage Repair Method
subtitle: 8OZ NEW WASH ORIGINAL, BOND BOOST AND BOND SERUM
details: The Damage Repair Method for all hair types heals damaged hair from the inside out in two nourishing steps powered by our exclusiveProTarget Technology™.First, addBond BoosttoNew Wash Originalto deliver more intense and prolonged recovery benefits than other hair repair treatments—all while you cleanse and condition.After rinsing thoroughly, follow withBond Serumfor maximum absorption of its reparative ingredients and heat protection up to 450°F.Double repair ProTarget Technology™ is uniquely formulated with liposomes that zero in on compromised areas of the hair.Within the fiber, a clinically proven complex with itaconic acid and arginine restores disulfide bonds that have been damaged by chemical treatments like dyes, bleach and relaxers.On the outer cuticle, nourishing ingredients including panthenol and ceramide NP replenish moisture to heal frizz and prevent split ends and breakage. Hair is stronger, smoother, softer and shinier—for longer.

name: Healthiest Hair Method
subtitle: PRE-WASH, NEW WASH ORIGINAL AND PRIMER
details: Who doesn’t want damn good hair, every single day? The Healthiest Hair Method is for all hair types and makes caring for your hair easy—giving you healthy, nourished and gorgeous hair day after day. This simple all-in-one haircare system purifies, cleanses and protects with only gentle, naturally derived ingredients.So, here’s the story:Prep your scalp before washing to get a quick deep-clean withPre-Wash, the first scalp-purifying rinse that uses prebiotic micellar technology to break down buildup while balancing and nourishing your scalp’s microbiome.Follow withNew Wash Original, a non-foaming cleansing cream formulated without harmful detergents that cleanses and conditions hair while balancing the scalp’s natural oils. Work it in and rinse it out with theMassaging Scalp Brush.After washing, add moisture-infusingPrimer, a lightweight protective mist that shields hair from heat up to 450°F and UV rays and sets you up for even smoother styling.

enhanced_description: Best for: all, buildup hair. CLARIFYING BUNDLE - BUILDUP REMOVAL: Complete clarifying system for removing buildup and resetting hair. Includes Pre-Wash for deep cleansing and clarifying treatments. Perfect for hair with product buildup or needing a fresh start. Bundle saves money compared to buying products separately.

name: Pre-Wash
subtitle: PREBIOTIC MICELLAR SCALP RINSE
details: Get a head start on your New Wash routine with a quick and refreshing deep clean. Pre-Wash uses purifying prebiotic micellar technology to gently break down product buildup, oil and dirt while balancing your scalp’s microbiome. Natural, upcycled betaine helps maintain optimal scalp moisture so you can go even longer between washes—even if you have super-oily hair.New to New Wash? Pre-Wash helps you make a clean break from damaging traditional shampoo to our detergent-free cleansing cream. If you’ve already made the switch, Pre-Wash ensures the most effective results for your hair and scalp.Vegan (U.S. only)Leaping Bunny CertifiedSilicone-FreeDetergent-FreeParaben-FreeMicrobiome-FriendlyRecyclableAlcohol-FreeFragrance-FreeColor-Safe
benefits: PURIFY Refreshes hair and removes unwanted product buildup, oil and dirtBALANCE Start with Pre-Wash to break down buildup, oil and dirt on the scalp with detergent-free micellar technology  (a first!). Prebiotics balance the scalp microbiome as you deep clean.TRANSITION Helps hair and scalp transition from traditional shampoo to detergent-free New Wash
how_to_use: 1. Divide dry hair into sections.2. Use the applicator tip to apply Pre-Wash evenly to roots and scalp, one section at a time.3. Massage into scalp with our signature Massaging Scalp Brush or your fingers and leave on for 3-4 minutes.4. Wash hair with New Wash.Use Pre-Wash with every wash or as needed to help remove excess oil, dirt and buildup from hair treatments or styling products. You can also use Pre-Wash between wash days for a refreshing cleansing experience—it won’t leave any greasy residue.
ingredients: Water, Propanediol, Betaine, Glycolipids, Inulin, Polyglyceryl-4 Pelargonate, Levulinic Acid, Tetrasodium Glutamate Diacetate, Caprylhydroxamic Acid, Glycerin, Sodium Levulinate, Maltodextrin, Citric Acid, Arginine, Nephelium Lappaceum (Rambutan) Seed Extract
enhanced_description: Best for: all, oily, product_buildup hair. Prebiotic micellar scalp rinse that purifies the scalp and removes product buildup. Use before New Wash for deeper cleansing. Ideal for oily hair, product buildup, or transitioning from traditional shampoo.

name: New Wash Dispenser with Pump
subtitle: 32OZ NEW WASH DISPENSER
details: Refillable, durable and made from rust-resistant brushed aluminum that’s recyclable at the end of a long life. You might even call it...indispensable.New Wash sold separately.Recyclable
how_to_use: 1. Dispense up to 32oz New Wash from any size of refill pouch. (Don't forget to rinse and recycle the pouch!)2. On wash day, pump out the amount you need for your New Wash routine.
enhanced_description: Convenient dispenser with pump for easy New Wash application. 32oz capacity perfect for regular users. Makes application easier and more controlled.
